review: Being informed many times it’s only for consulting.. they had billed 4750 ******* ******* . Post receiving bill found that she has already prescribed medicine separately for the issue and all the bills for future scope and understand if there is future scope for problem.. total bill was 6350 for just consulting and few medicines for just general query and issue

review: A great doctor for me & my family. Our treatment for a baby for almost six years came to a successful end after meeting Mam. Great personal care, Friendly staff. All the very best to Madam & the Team God bless.....
